mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card( bookId, pointId, cardData, createTime, createId )VALUES( #{bookId}, #{pointId}, #{cardData}, #{createTime}, #{createId} )
mapper.select: select * from card t where t.id=#{cardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE point t set t.number=t.number+1 WHERE t.id=#{id}
UPDATE point t ,card b set t.number=t.number-1 WHERE b.id=#{id} AND t.id =b.pointId
